events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application for the engineering role has been reviewed and categorized accordingly to match the software engineering department.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage your application process to ensure smooth communication and timely updates.
The initial screening of your software engineering application was successful; we would like to proceed to the next stages.
Thank you for responding promptly and confirming your availability for the technical interview session.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the software developer role on May 10th at 2 PM UTC.
You completed your technical interview with the engineering panel successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed enthusiasm for the opportunity to join our engineering team.
We have extended an employment offer to you for the software engineer position reflecting competitive compensation and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and are excited about the prospect of joining the engineering team.
You officially accepted the job offer and expressed eagerness to start contributing to our software engineering projects.
The onboarding process has begun; welcome to the engineering team! Orientation and setup are underway.
The recruitment process is now complete. We are delighted to have successfully onboarded you as part of our engineering workforce.
